summary.description:
Mobile training and support (MOTS) service-using technology to increase Ebola preparedness of remotely-located community health workers (CHWs) in Sierra Leone.

As in many African countries, the Community Health Worker (CHW) is the backbone of the healthcare system, and the focus and objective of the Mobile Training and Support (MOTS) project will be strengthening this network to ensure preparedness for Ebola vaccine campaigns and outbreak response.
